product_name: Coghlan's Camp Kit-To-Go for Kids' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Coghlan's Camp Kit-To-Go for Kids' includes a kite, light sticks, a 4-function whistle and a flashlight to provide hours of outdoor fun for young ones on summer camping trips. Includes an easy-to-fly parafoil kite with 200 ft. of line on a spool. Nontoxic light sticks come in 4 assorted colors; each light stick is 4 in. long. 4-function whistle includes a 2-scale thermometer, a magnifier and a compass. Explorer's flashlight comes with 4 interchangable colored lenses (2 AA batteries not included). Closeout.
short_description: Coghlan's Camp Kit-To-Go for Kids' includes a kite, light sticks, a 4-function whistle and a flashlight to provide hours of outdoor fun for young ones on summer camping trips.
